text: Mohammad Reza Mahdavi Kani (, 8 April 1931 â€” 21 October 2014) was an Iranian cleric, writer and conservative politician. He was the acting Prime Minister of Iran from 2 September until 29 October 1981. Kani died at the age of 83 in Tehran, Iran from heart failure, aged 83. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Disease- related deaths in Iran Category:Politicians from Tehran Category:Prime Ministers of Iran
